fields.name: Base Rent:
fields.value:
price of an average cheap plane ticket when I looked it up (93$)
1 Airplane: 100$
2 Airplanes: 150$
3 Airplanes: 230$
4 Airplanes: 300$
5 Airplanes: The average cost of a plane ticket in the U.S.A when I looked up "average plane ticket cost **2023**" (380$)
6 Airplanes: 420$ (nice)
7 Airplanes: 470$

Airplanes cost the amount of Rent they make the property. (so a 3rd airplane costs 230$, and a 7th one costs 470$)

fields.name: Stop-In Effect:
fields.value: After paying the rent, the owner may **Advance** you up to X spaces backwards or forwards, with X equaling the amount of airplanes this property has.
